}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The Hercules FCC ID is NAM5090178. The Edimax FCC ID (not likely printed on the unit) is NDD9573180519.
"1244-00000484-01Z" is silkscreened on the board in the images below.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.hercules.com/us/wifi/bdd/p/33/hercules-wifi-usb-transmitter-hwgusb2-54v2-ap-/ Product page], [http://ts.hercules.com/eng/index.php?pg=view_files&gid=9&fid=32&pid=195&cid=1 Drivers]
[http://trac.kismac-ng.org/ticket/255 kismac ticket adding the ID (w/ OUI)]
